sentences.en: A third view proposes attaining universal suffrage in phases after 2016.
sentences.cn: 仲有意见认为应该分阶段系2016年以后达至普选.

sentences.en: Absolve you and you shall have the suffrage of the world.
sentences.cn: 终于你的内心,你将会得到世界的认可.

sentences.en: An increasing number of states granted white manhood suffrage during his administration.
sentences.cn: 在他当政期间,保证白人成年公民选举权的州越来越多.

sentences.en: And lastly the possessing class rules directly by means of universal suffrage.
sentences.cn: 最后,有产阶级是直接通过普选制来统治的.

sentences.en: I am in favor of woman's suffrage.
In England, women suffrage was established in 1928.
sentences.cn: 在英国, 女性投票权是在1928年确立的.

sentences.en: People have been demanding a legislature chosen by universal suffrage.
sentences.cn: 民众要求立法机关通过”普选“的方式选出.

sentences.en: The Female Suffrage movement experienced rapid success.
sentences.cn: 妇女选举运动迅速取得了成功.

sentences.en: The lecturer of last evening went the whole length in advocating woman suffrage.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上的演说者竭尽所能提倡妇女投票权.

sentences.en: The question of woman suffrage sets them at variance.
sentences.cn: 妇女参政的问题使他们发生争执.

sentences.en: The voters gave their suffrage to him.
They robbed thousands of voters of their suffrage.
sentences.cn: 他们剥夺了成千上万选民的选举权.

sentences.en: Universal suffrage is thus the gauge of the maturity of the working class.
sentences.cn: 因此,普选制是测量工人阶级成熟性的标尺.

sentences.en: Universal suffrage was introduced and human rights were guaranteed.
sentences.cn: 普选被引入,人权有了保障.

sentences.en: When was universal suffrage introduced in your country?
sentences.cn: 贵国是什么时候实行普选权的?

words.tran_cn: 妇女政权论者；参政权扩大论者

trans.tran_cn: （政治性选举的）选举权，投票权
trans.tran_en: the right to vote in national elections
